amendment.description: To provide additional funding for the Fund for the Improvement of Education.

action.text: Amendment SA 1575 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1575 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 46. Record Vote Number: 329.
Point of order under the Budget Act raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1575.
Amendment SA 1575 proposed by Senator Harkin to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR S11088-11094; text: CR S11090) To provide additional funding for the Fund for the Improvement of Education.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1575 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 46. Record Vote Number: 329.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1575 proposed by Senator Harkin to Amendment SA 1542.
